snippet.title: The Little Brave - Story Teaser
snippet.description:
#indiegame #metroidvania #platformer #gaming #madewithunity 

BE BRAVE ADD TO WISHLIST ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724300/The_Little_Brave

Become a brave hero and embark to the dangerous journey though mysterious forbidden lands. Reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic and gain courage to slay the terrible monster!

Original Score: https://www.josemorajimenez.nl/
Animation: https://www.chaseacloud.com/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724300/The_Little_Brave
Website: https://thelittlebrave.games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LittleBraveGame
